mapper.insert: insert into user_mst values( 0, #{user_name}, #{user_email}, #{user_password}, #{oauth2_id}, #{user_phone}, #{user_roles}, #{user_provider}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: select user_code, user_name, user_email, user_password, oauth2_id, user_phone, user_roles, user_provider from user_mst where user_email = #{useremail}
select user_code, user_name, user_email, user_password, oauth2_id, user_phone, user_roles, user_provider from user_mst where oauth2_id = #{username}
